tool_name: Refactor numbers in human readable form like 1K or 1M
tool_description: By this API, you can refactor any number into human-readable form like 1000 can be read as 1K, or 1000000 can be read as 1M.
title: Refactor numbers in human readable form like 1K or 1M

api_list.name: Number
api_list.description:
Send a number to get the refactored human-readable form of the number.
You can use this to show the price for your products to your e-commerce website, and many more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://refactor-numbers-in-human-readable-form-like-1k-or-1m.p.rapidapi.com/{number}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "refactor-numbers-in-human-readable-form-like-1k-or-1m.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
